projects.title: Bebot
projects.description:
This is a music-playing bot I use with my friends on Discord.
This project has gone through multiple iterations, and I am still frequently updating it and exploring new features.
It interacts with Discord's API through the discord.py Python library and uses yt-dlp for searching and downloading audio tracks.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description:
This website.
It is a simple and clean portfolio to showcase my projects.
For its development, I use Go together with the Gin framework for the backend, Tailwind CSS for the styling, HTMX for loading dynamic content, and Templ as the templating language.

projects.title: GeoQuest
projects.description:
GeoQuest is an AR treasure hunting game for Android mobile devices.
It was developed in the context of a university team project assignment.
Using image recognition and AR, we developed a game intended to be used in cultural spaces such as museums, art galleries, etc.
Players would take part in predefined quests, following different clues and using their mobile phones to make the stories come to life.
